content: Now free of the cymbals that once trapped Sun Wukong himself, Zhu Bajie may appear grumpy, but he's willing to help the Destined One on his journey. He'll run off to the front of the Turtle Island where the giant beast's head is, and you can follow him to get the main story moving to the rest of the Bitter Lake area, but there's a few things worth checking out here first.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Turtle Island'.
The content is as follows:
Now free of the cymbals that once trapped Sun Wukong himself, Zhu Bajie may appear grumpy, but he's willing to help the Destined One on his journey. He'll run off to the front of the Turtle Island where the giant beast's head is, and you can follow him to get the main story moving to the rest of the Bitter Lake area, but there's a few things worth checking out here first.
